title: Configuration block
extract: provider functions are executed, so they and the services they define can be made available to the $injector. After that, the configuration blocks (config functions) are executed. This means the configuration blocks of the required modules execute before the configuration blocks of any requiring module.
extract_html: provider functions are executed, so they and the services they define can be made available to the $injector. After that, the configuration blocks (config functions) are executed. This means the configuration blocks of the required modules execute before the configuration blocks of any requiring module.
